org.pojava.persistence.factories
Class DefaultFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.pojava.persistence.factories.DefaultFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
SerialFactory<java.lang.Object>
public class DefaultFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements SerialFactory<java.lang.Object>

The DefaultFactory is a multi-purpose factory for handling objects with single-value constructors, such as primitives.

Author:
John Pile
